snippet.title: Amber Heard Accuses Johnny Depp Of Smashing IPhone Into Her Face
snippet.description:
In court today, Amber has accused Johnny of using her phone as a weapon, TMZ reports. The actress “claims Depp smashed his iPhone on her face”, and that “the pic was taken shortly after she was allegedly struck”. As you can see in the pic, the red bruising around Amber’s eye and cheek is shaped like a rectangle, and is roughly the size of an imprint that an iPhone would leave behind.

Along with her lawyer, Samantha Spector, Amber showed up in court today to ask for a temporary restraining order against Johnny. Most shocking of all is that Amber is claiming this alleged abuse has happened multiple times throughout their relationship since they were married in 2015.

Amber is also claiming that Johnny “offered her money to stay quiet” after he allegedly hit her, and now she’s filing for the restraining order on the grounds that there’s “an immediate threat of harm”. Meanwhile, Johnny has been traveling out of town since Wednesday to promote his new movie, Alice Through The Looking Glass, which opens today. As a result, Johnny was represented by Laura Wassar during Amber’s court appearance.

Keep checking back to HollywoodLife.com for up-to-the-minute details as this story develops.

Stream music, completely unlimited and ad-free, RIGHT HERE

HollywoodLifers, are you proud of Amber for coming forward and standing up for herself in this horrible situation?
